contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name=Zhlobin |native_name = [[Belarusian language|Belarusian]]:Жло́бін |nickname = |image_skyline =Zhlobin_city_hall-BY.jpg |image_size = |image_caption = City hall |image_flag =Flag of Zhlobin.jpg |image_seal =Coat of Arms of Žłobin, Belarus.png |image_map = |map_caption = |pushpin_map=Belarus |coordinates_region = BY |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = {{flag|Belarus}} |subdivision_type1=Voblast |subdivision_name1=[[Homiel Voblast]] |subdivision_type2=Raion |subdivision_name2= |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_title = Founded |established_date = July 3, 1925 |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = 28 |area_land_km2 = |area_water_km2 = |population_as_of = 2012 |population_note = |population_total =80 200 |population_metro = |population_density_km2 = auto |timezone = [[Eastern European Summer Time|EEET]] |utc_offset = +3 |latd=52 |latm=54 |lats=|latNS=N |longd=30 |longm=02 |longs=|longEW=E |elevation_m = 140 |postal_code_type =Postal code |postal_code =247210 |area_code = +375 2334 |blank_name = License plate |blank_info = 3 |footnotes = }} '''Zhlobin''' ({{lang-be|Жло́бін}}; {{lang-ru|Жло́бин}}) is a city in the [[Homiel Voblast]] of [[Belarus]], on the [[Dnieper river]]. As of 2012, the population is 80.200. The town was first mentioned in writing in 1492.{{Citation needed|date=November 2010}} The city is notable for being the location where steelmaker [[Byelorussian_Steel_Works|BMZ]] was established. BMZ is one of the largest companies in Belarus, and an important producer in the worldwide markets of steel wires and cord. The company is the main sustainer of the town's economy. ==External links== *[http://zhlobin.org Zhlobin.org: Information and photos (in Russian)] *[http://radzima.org/pub/miesta.php?miesta_id1=hozhzhlo Photos on Radzima.org] *[http://zhlobin.by Zhlobin.By: News, photos, useful files (in Russian)] *[http://irc.zhlobin.by Irc.Zhlobin.By: Internet Relay Chat (in Russian)] {{Homyel Voblast}} {{Coord|52|54|N|30|02|E|region:BY_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Populated places in Gomel Region]] [[Category:Cities in Belarus]] {{Belarus-geo-stub}}
